name: shiva
description: The god of EC2 instance creation and destruction

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run eslint && NODE_PATH=./lib NODE_ENV=test lab -m 1000 -v -c -a code test/unit test/functional
scripts.integration-server: LOG_LEVEL=debug NODE_PATH=./lib lab -a code -v -m 300000 test/integration/server.js | bunyan
scripts.init-db: createuser -s -d shiva; createdb shiva; createdb shiva-test
scripts.migrate: npm run migrate-dev && npm run migrate-test
scripts.rollback: npm run rollback-dev && npm run rollback-test
scripts.queues: while true; do OP=$(rabbitmqctl list_queues); clear; echo "$OP"; sleep 0.5; done;

author: Ryan Sandor Richards <ryan@runnable.com> (http://www.runnable.com)
